casebody.data:
STATE of New Jersey, Plaintiff-Respondent,
v.
Thomas L. COAR, a/k/a Thomas Coar, Defendant-Petitioner. C-1054 September Term 2017
080757 Supreme Court of New Jersey. July 20, 2018

ON PETITION FOR CERTIFICATION

To the Appellate Division, Superior Court:

A petition for certification of the judgment in A-004378-15 having been submitted to this Court, and the Court having considered the same;

It is ORDERED that the petition for certification is denied.
